footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Cyno | Update Date: 10/01/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Staff of the Scarlet Sands__
Cyno’s signature weapon and Best-in-Slot providing bountiful stat boosts, especially when using an EM sands as it double dips into Cyno’s EM + ATK scaling.

__White Tassel R5__ 
Excellent low investment, F2P weapon choice for Cyno owing to the large, uncoditional NA DMG% and crit rate mainstat it has — even with its notably low base attack. 
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Winged Spear__
One of the few times PJWS’ passive stacks can be utilized to the fullest extent, showing its potential on sustained On-Field characters. 

__Deathmatch__
Strong 4 star weapon that provides a large amount of Crit Rate for Cyno to better balance his Crit ratio, but is not worth purchasing a copy of/ refining for should players have an R5 White Tassel.

__Staff of Homa__
Although better than his F2P weapons and marginally better than a low-refinement Deathmatch, it is far more recommendable to use homa on other characters that benefits more significantly in comparison to Cyno. ( With the exception of aesthetics )

__Missive Windspear R5__
Event weapon that — although viable — does not perform better than the already impressive and mostly uncontested White Tassel R5. Only consider upgrading if the player had foddered their White Tassel. 
** **

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
**Artifact Notes**
*EM vs ATK?*
Overall, they have similar performance with a few exceptions; use the one with better substats. Generally, low base attacks prefer EM sands while high base attack weapons would prefer ATK sands. 

*ER Requirements?*
Solo Electro ~ 160-180%+
Double Electro ( Fischl ) ~ 100-120% 
Double Electro ( non-Fischl ) ~ 120-150%
*ER requirements assume 1 favonius proc; 4 TF lowers ER requirements further* 

*Regarding 4 Thundering Fury…*
Works well for Cyno — both to lower ER requirements and increase personal damage — but restricts users to a fixed combo as the reduction in E CD can be more detrimental than helpful. ( owing to missing Endseer timings )
For most, it is more recommended to ditch 4 Thundering Fury on Cyno unless confident in executing the specific combos.
